G

Game - Class in piccross
This class represent our main which will run the game.
Game() - Constructor for class piccross.Game
 
gameBoolVec - Static variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
Represents the game in 0 and 1 for sending it to server.
gameDone() - Method in class piccross.PiccrossModel
This method will disable the boxes after the game is done.
gameIsDone - Static variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
used to indicate if the game is finished.
GameRunner - Class in piccross
This class represents our main and it will start the program.
GameRunner() - Constructor for class piccross.GameRunner
 
getAddress() - Method in class piccross.PiccrossNetworkModalVC
Getter method to return the value of the network address.
getConsoleOutputTextArea() - Static method in class piccross.PiccrossView
This method is a getter to JTextArea consoleOutputTextArea which represents the text area that user will see output of program or server.
getDebug() - Static method in class piccross.PiccrossView
This method is a getter for debug variable which if set to true it will show additional info on console .
getGameBoolVec() - Static method in class piccross.PiccrossView
This method is a getter to String gameBoolVec object.
getGridPanel() - Method in class piccross.PiccrossModel
This method is a getter for gridPanel which will be used in view.
getGridSize() - Static method in class piccross.PiccrossView
This method is a getter for gridSize.
getHover() - Static method in class piccross.PiccrossView
This method is a getter for hover variable which if set to true it will add hove option to the game but currently its a bit buggy so default is set to false.
getName() - Method in class piccross.PiccrossNetworkModalVC
Getter method to return the value of the user's name as-typed.
getPointTextField() - Method in class piccross.PiccrossModel
This method is a getter for pointTextField.
getPort() - Method in class piccross.PiccrossNetworkModalVC
Getter method to return the value of the port the user selected in the JComboBox.
getSocket() - Static method in class piccross.PiccrossView
This method is a getter for Socket which represents the socket that clients makes the connection to server.
getStatus() - Method in class piccross.ControllableTimer
Permits checking the status of the timer.
getTime() - Method in class piccross.ControllableTimer
 
getTimeElapsed(int) - Static method in class piccross.PiccrossView
This method will calculate the time that our game has been running and returns it as string in proper format.
getTimer() - Static method in class piccross.PiccrossView
This method is a getter to timer object.
getTimerLabel() - Method in class piccross.PiccrossView
This method is a getter to timer object.
getValue(int) - Method in class piccross.PiccrossModel.numPanel
This method is a getter which will return a single index of value array.
gridBool - Static variable in class piccross.PiccrossModel
Represents the true grid which will be true or false depending on random generation of the game.
gridBoolSelected - Static variable in class piccross.PiccrossModel
Represents the boxes that are selected by the user.
gridButtons - Static variable in class piccross.PiccrossModel
gridButtons will hold buttons which will represent our grid.
gridPanel - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossModel
gridPanel will hold the 5x5 gridPanel for our Picross game.
gridSelected - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossModel
Represents the total boxes that user selected.
gridSize - Static variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
Represents the grid size for our game for example 5 means 5x5 grid.
